Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Triton One was one of the first infrastructure providers working on Solana. We began by operating the public RPC nodes that were made available freely to the Solana ecosystem in 2021. Since then we have been an active stakeholder in many Solana projects including ensuring the replication and development of historical archives for Solana. This project seeks to make available a fully queryable historical archive of Solana data on Filecoin.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Solana blockchain data - daily data dumps of blocks and transactions produced by the validators of the chain.
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset:
Solana data is natively represented in IPLD format and can be exported directly as CAR files. There is no additional data preparation required.

IPLD schema: https://github.com/firedancer-io/radiance/blob/main/pkg/ipld/ipldsch/ipldsch_types.go
Car generator: https://github.com/firedancer-io/radiance/blob/main/pkg/ipld/cargen/cargen.go.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: Cloud storage (i.e. S3), HTTP or FTP server
